name: In this skin
description:
Content warning: rape, victim-blaming

There is no one way to play this game. There is no one way in which we experience sexual violence.

An in-development work of interactive fiction created for the 2020 Cahoots Lab, In this skin burrows into the ambiguities and silences of sexual violence narratives. The game navigates through the complexities of identity, the slipperiness of memory, and social taboos. Do you trust it enough to enter?
